#summary pixmap widget definition

= pixmap widget =
----
== Definition ==
{{{
<pixmap tag_attr="value" tag_attr="value" ...>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<height>value</height>
	<width>value</width>
	<input file stock="gtk-imagename"></input>
	<input file>filename</input>
	<visible>state</visible>
</pixmap>
}}}
